action.action-desc: Mr. Yoho (for himself, Mr. Gosar, Mr. Francis Rooney of Florida, Mr. Perry, and Mr. Pearce) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Natural Gas Act to expedite approval of exports of small volumes of natural gas, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Small Scale LNG Access Act of 2017.

section.header: Expedited approval of export of certain volumes of natural gas
section.text: Section 3(c) of the Natural Gas Act (15 U.S.C. 717b(c)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking (c) For purposes of and inserting the following:
by adding at the end the following:
For purposes of subsection (a), any application for the exportation of natural gas in a volume that is equal to or less than 51,100,000,000 cubic feet per year of natural gas shall be—

subparagraph.text: deemed to be consistent with the public interest; and

paragraph.text: Paragraphs (1) and (2) shall not apply to any nation subject to sanctions imposed by the United States.
